name: Stars' Lullaby
description:
Where will you go when you close your eyes for the final time?

A million answers will be provided to you, each from different religion, belief, or culture.

To Heaven, to Hell, to Purgatory,  or you simply cease to exist.

And here, souls with regrets or unfinished businesses arrive at the In Between Place. They cannot move on unless their regrets are taken care of. How, you say? Why, that's the job of their Reapers.

Follow the journey of a young boy, who passed away because of his terminal illness, along with his Reaper, who doesn't have any memories prior to his death, to see the paths they take, the souls they meet, and the truth behind their lives.

This is currently in development. Only Chapter I is currenly aviliable.
